attributes.action: give council houses to decent people
attributes.additional_details:
We woulds like the government to stop this reward the bad punish the good sentiment they have!

We want 2 see decent people(people who work,take care of children contribute to this society) getting the first choice of council houses not the scum of the day (drug abusers, alcoholics, people coming out of jail)

There are so many hard working people out there that feel as if its a struggle to keep there heads above water! stuck In over expensive un secure private lets!

Its about time the government gave us something back! we are the ones who pay our taxes, try and keep our streets clean! raise our children with respect for other people and the law! but the message we are receiving back Is disgusting!

We want out of private lets and Into council houses!!

We want to come before the scum of the day!
